titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by University Archives staff, 1987 November; finding aid revised by Katharine A. Lawrie, 2013 May; machine-readable finding aid created by Katharine A. Lawrie, 2013 June.

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-06-06T10:25-0700

did.abstract: Record Series 84 contains the historian notebooks of UCLA's Faculty Women's Club. Notebooks include history, lists of officers and presidents, and reports.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been assigned to the UCLA University Archives. All requests for permission to publish or quote from the records must be submitted in writing to the University Archivist. Permission for publication is given on behalf of the UCLA University Archives as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission of the copyright holder, which must also be obtained.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Faculty Women's Club. Historian notebooks (University Archives Record Series 84). UCLA Library Special Collections, University Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Record Series 84 contains the historian notebooks of UCLA's Faculty Women's Club. Notebooks include history, lists of officers and presidents, and reports.
This is an active record series; additional University records are expected to be added.

did.unittitle: History of the Faculty Women's Club.
